name: mobile-tracking-sdk
description: Cross-platform mobile tracking SDK for iOS, Android, and React Native

scripts.test: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android && npm run test:react-native
scripts.test:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild test -scheme MobileTracker -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 14'
